name: market for power saw, without catalytic converter | power saw, without catalytic converter | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/2486/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'power saw, without catalytic converter', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is a mobile infrastructure, representing the product of a power saw, without catalytic converter that is used to cut wood, plastic, metals, concrete and other materials like tiles and bricks. Its service life capacity is around 2,500 hours its lifetime estimated to be 1.4205 years.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'power saw, without catalytic converter',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'power saw, without catalytic converter',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2818:Manufacture of power-driven hand tools
